SKILL_005.name: Black Belt Meal (Lo)
SKILL_005.explain: Reduces stamina depletion when performing stamina-draining moves such as evading, etc.

SKILL_007.name: Tumbler Meal (Lo)
SKILL_007.explain: Slightly extends the invulnerability period when evading.

SKILL_013.name: Immunizer Meal
SKILL_013.explain: Lessens the effects of a variety of ailments.

SKILL_014.name: Medic Meal
SKILL_014.explain: Increases the amount of health recovered when healing.

SKILL_015.name: Sizzling Meal
SKILL_015.explain: Negates the effects of hot or cold climates and increases defense while in such areas.

SKILL_024.name: Rider Meal
SKILL_024.explain: Makes it easier to mount monsters.

SKILL_025.name: Riser Meal
SKILL_025.explain: Extends the invulnerability period when getting up.

SKILL_026.name: Iron Carver Meal
SKILL_026.explain: Prevents knockbacks from attacks while carving.

SKILL_027.name: Escape Artist Meal
SKILL_027.explain: Decreases stamina depletion when fleeing from large monsters.

SKILL_028.name: Balanced Meal
SKILL_028.explain: Prevents you from getting knocked on your butt.

SKILL_030.name: Bulldozer Meal
SKILL_030.explain: Increases attack power when you strike right after an attack is deflected.

SKILL_031.name: Deflector Meal
SKILL_031.explain: Helps your weapon retain sharpness when attacks are deflected.

SKILL_034.name: Piping-Hot Meal
SKILL_034.explain: Greatly increases attack when health is dangerously low.

SKILL_035.name: Break-time Meal
SKILL_035.explain: Grants a temporary attack boost when you use the Kick Back gesture for a while.

SKILL_037.name: Fisher Meal
SKILL_037.explain: Increases the likelihood that fish will bite when fishing.

SKILL_038.name: Top Cat Meal
SKILL_038.explain: Powers up Palico attack and defense.
